descriptions: The fault code P0335 indicates that there is an issue with the Crankshaft Position “A” Circuit Malfunction.
causes: Faulty oxygen sensor
Damaged wiring or connections in the circuit
Corroded or loose electrical connections
Failed engine control module (ECM)
solutions: Replace the oxygen sensor
Check and repair any damaged wiring or connections
Tighten or clean any loose or corroded electrical connections
Replace the engine control module (ECM) if necessary

descriptions: The fault code P0130 indicates that there is an issue with the O2 Sensor Circuit (Bank 1, Sensor 1).
causes: Failed wastegate solenoid
Faulty wiring or connections in the circuit
Corrosion or damage to electrical connections
Failed engine control module (ECM)
solutions: Replace the wastegate solenoid
Check and repair any damaged wiring or connections
Clean or replace corroded electrical connections
Replace the engine control module (ECM) if necessary

code_details.meaning: Mass or Volume Air Flow “A” Circuit
descriptions: The fault code P0100 indicates that there is an issue with the Mass or Volume Air Flow “A” Circuit
causes: Failed wastegate solenoid
Faulty wiring or connections in the circuit
Corrosion or damage to electrical connections
Failed engine control module (ECM)
solutions: Replace the wastegate solenoid
Check and repair any damaged wiring or connections
Clean or replace corroded electrical connections

descriptions: The fault code C1511 indicates that there is an error in the Torque Sensor 1 Malfunction
causes: Corrupted or incorrect programming of the ECM
Failed ECM hardware
Electrical problems in the ECM circuit
Improper installation or reprogramming of the ECM
solutions: Reprogram or replace the ECM to correct the programming error
Check and repair any damaged wiring or connections in the ECM circuit
Ensure proper installation procedures are followed when replacing or reprogramming the ECM
Replace the ECM hardware if necessary
symptoms: Various drivability issues such as poor performance, stalling, or rough idling may occur
